name: Hachi tō Hachi
description:
Welcome to the world of Eitto! On this island, the eight elements and its civilians live in peace... however it was not always that way. After the big responsibility of guarding the elemental entities- the Jima Orbs- was trusted to the wrong duo, our titular Hachi, an octopus, and Hachi, a bee,  they must right their wrongs and set out for the Jima Orbs! Along their way they must also hunt for the bricks of the shrine the orbs once called their home, and calm the distressed squeals- the constantly screaming seals! Enjoy this 3D platformer-collectathon demo that was worked on rigorously all of the Fall 2021 semester by the students in Webster University's Video Game Production (GAME 4600) class!

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Camera: Mouse Movement

Jump: Spacebar

Talk: E

Melee Attack: Left Mouse Click

Ranged Attack: Right Mouse Click

Swap to Sky Mode (On Land) / Land Mode (In Sky): V key

Switch Ammo Types (On Land): Mouse Wheel

Tentaspring (Land Only): Hold Left Control on ground for 2 seconds then press Space

Sprint: Double-Tap W
